title: Ambulance Service
short_description: 24/7 emergency and non-emergency ambulance support with trained staff.

title: Telemedicine Service
short_description: Online doctor consultations and prescriptions through video or phone.

title: Blood Donation Service
short_description: Find donors, request blood, and manage donation drives.

title: Education Equipment Support
short_description: Provide books, stationery, and digital devices for students in need.

title: Zakat Distribution
short_description: Transparent and targeted zakat distribution to eligible individuals.

title: Oxygen Cylinder Service
short_description: Medical oxygen supply for patients at home or in hospital.

title: Wheelchair Distribution
short_description: Provide manual and electric wheelchairs to people with mobility issues.
